member.name: T:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest
member.summary:
Component manifests contains a human-created short metadata about a top-level functional component in an assembly.
A component is 'something of interest for a user' a tool, an app (or significant part of it), a plugin etc.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the component

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the short description of the component.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest.DocumentationUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the component documentation URI.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest.Tags
member.summary: Gets or sets the tags that should allow for a component to be found in a repository catalog.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ComponentManifest.Properties
member.summary: Gets or sets the additional key-value properties associated with a component. These properties might be enriched by a transmitter plugin automatically (e.g. if a transmitter plugin uses reflection to scan through code for some extra info)

member.name: T:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo
member.summary:
Project info contains data about a project, understood as a class library or an executable.
Projects can contain zero or more components They can contain a set of plugins, tool or functionalities, however they can only be helper assemblies which do not contain any high-level components (in which case they are not interesting from the point of view of repository catalog).
Project info is also different from a component manifest in that a project properties are automatically extracted from the project file (e.g. csproj), whereas component manifests are intended as a human-to-human communication

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.ProjectName
member.summary: The name of the project (e.g. the name of the csproj file)

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.ProjectUri
member.summary: Gets or sets the project URI.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.AssemblyName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the assembly generated by this project

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.OutputType
member.summary: Gets or sets the type of the project output (class library, windows app etc)

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.TargetExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets the target extension.

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.RepositoryName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the repository in which the project lives

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.RepositoryStamp
member.summary: A datetime or version stamp of the repository as of when the project info was read and transmitted

member.name: P:RepoCat.Transmission.Models.ProjectInfo.Components
member.summary: Gets or sets the components manifests
